Question
========
In a survey by current affairs program EenVandaag (*source*: nos.nl, April 11, 2018) among 9000 Dutch people with a Facebook account (n = 9000), 22% of respondents indicated that they were planning to to delete his/her account on Facebook. Set the 95% confidence interval of the proportion of Dutch Facebook users that plan to delete his/her account. delete.
